Alytica.name: Alytica
Alytica.history: Alytica's history is shrouded in mystery, known only for his wisdom and guidance.
Alytica.description: A figure of wisdom and knowledge, Alytica is revered for his insight.
Alytica.custom_details: Known for providing cryptic but valuable advice to those who seek his counsel.

Charon.name: Charon
Charon.history: Charon is known for ferrying souls across the rivers of the underworld, a task they have performed for eons.
Charon.description: A stoic and silent figure, Charon is dedicated to their duty as the ferryman.
Charon.custom_details: Requires payment in the form of a coin placed in the mouth of the deceased to ferry souls across the river Styx.

Justice.name: Justice
Justice.history: Justice serves as the arbiter of balance, ensuring fairness and equity in all realms.
Justice.description: A figure of fairness and impartiality, Justice is respected for her unwavering commitment to balance.
Justice.custom_details: Often depicted blindfolded with scales, representing her impartial judgment based on evidence rather than appearance.
